attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
For the past few years, services and resources within Ayrshire have been cut back, due to financial restraints.

However this does not help the service users, who require the help.  But this does not seem to be taken into consideration when the cutbacks are made.

Therefore we, the undersigned, petition for these cutbacks to STOP, and re-instate the essential services which have already been ceased.
